title:
Investors punish Microsoft, Alphabet as AI returns fall short of lofty 
expectations
text: Both Microsoft and Alphabet reported generous increases to their cloud revenue in the December quarter, beating Wall Street estimates, as customers lined up to test these new AI features and build their own AI services.
